channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Steelers' Win Over the Dolphins
item.description: The Steelers maintained their lead in the AFC North with a dominant win over the Dolphins. Here's how it went down.

item.title: MLB Free Agency Rumors, Buzz: Mets Exploring Trading Multiple Infielders, Pitchers
item.description: Keeping track of players who may be on the move, manager comings and goings, and other buzz from around the majors.

item.title: Heisman Rankings: Joel Klatt's Top 5 Candidates for 2026
item.description: A pair of Ohio State stars lead the way in Joel Klatt's early top five for the 2026 Heisman race.

item.title: 2025 NFL Power Rankings Week 16: Are the Broncos the Best Team in Football?
item.description: Ralph Vacchiano sorts out the NFL's hierarchy after every week of the 2025 season.

item.title: Chiefs' Mahomes has surgery for torn ACL, LCL

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United monitor Bournemouth duo Adams, Scott

item.title: Flagg youngest ever to score 40 as Mavs fall in OT
item.description: Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg became the youngest player in NBA history to score 40 points after he dropped 42 in an overtime loss Monday.

item.title: Rockets' Udoka lashes out at refs after OT loss
item.description: Rockets coach Ime Udoka was critical of the officiating after his team's OT loss to the Nuggets, calling out the crew for inconsistent calls.
